title: Two godly and learned sermons, made by that famous and woorthy instrument in Gods church, M. Iohn Caluin. Which sermons were long since translated out of Latine into English, by M. Robert Horne late Byshop of Winchester, at what time he suffered exile from his country, for the testimony of a good conscience, as his apology in the beginning of the booke will witnes. And because these sermons haue long lyen hidden in silence, and many godly and religious persons, haue beene very desirous of them: at theyr earnest request they are nowe published by A.M.
author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by John Charlewood] for Henry Car, and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard, ouer against the signe of the blasing starre,
